feed.title: Coder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.20.2
entry.content:
Stable (since April 1, 2025)

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • Hide deleted users from org members query (#16830, 3569e56cf) (@aslilac)
  • Fix deployment settings navigation issues (#16780, 8a3ebaca0) (@aslilac)

Compare: v2.20.1...v2.20.2

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.20.2

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.21.0
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Use AI coding agents in Coder

With Coder, you can self-host AI coding agents in isolated development environments. To learn more, read our documentation on running AI agents in Coder.

Features

  • Support user session tracking in the audit log (#16703, f1b357d6f) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Add support for workspace app audit (#16801, de41bd6b9) (@mafredri)

    User sessions are now recorded in the audit log.

  • Implement WorkspaceCreationBan org role (#16686, cccdf1eca) (@Emyrk)

    Adds a native role that prevents users from creating workspaces in an organization.

  • Add notifications inbox database (#16599, c074f77a4) (@defelmnq)
  • Add notifications widget in the navbar (#16983, ab8ba9670) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Server: Add new dispatch logic for coder inbox (#16764, 522181fea) (@defelmnq)

    New notifications inbox shows alerts in the dashboard. Can be used in isolation or with SMTP/Webhook notifications.

  • Add devcontainer in the UI (#16800, 861c4b140) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Check for .ps1 dotfiles scripts on windows (#16785, edf28895c) (@aslilac)

    Allows coder dotfiles to use the correct binary on Windows machines.

  • Allow selecting the initial organization for new users (#16829, 32c36d533) (@aslilac)
  • Add provisioner jobs into the UI (#16867, 564b38726) (@BrunoQuaresma)

    Adds dashboard page to view a log of provisioner jobs.

  • Display error if a workspace app is not installed (#16980, 13d0dac79) (@mtojek)
  • Filter users by github user id in the users list CLI command (#17029, a71aa202d) (@hugodutka)
  • Agent: Set additional login vars, LOGNAME and SHELL (#16874, 3005cb459) (@mafredri)
  • CLI: Preserve table column order (#16843, 4b1da9b89) (@mtojek)
  • CLI: Add coder open app <workspace> <app-slug> command (#17032, 0474888eb) (@johnstcn)
  • CLI: Start workspace in no-wait mode (#17087, 56082f3b8) (@mtojek)

    Allows workspace builds to be run without awaiting user input via the CLI. Helps with executing bulk operations.

Bug fixes

  • Return provisioners in desc order and add limit to CLI (#16720, 7cd6e9cdd) (@mafredri)
  • Add org role read permissions to site wide template admins and auditors (#16733, bf5b00282) (@jaaydenh)
  • Handle undefined job while updating build progress to fix "Cannot read properties of undefined" dashboard error (#16732, 0ea06012f) (@mtojek)
  • Allow orgs with default github provider (#16755, 95347b2b9) (@hugodutka)
  • Display all available settings in deployment page (#16798, 975ea23d6) (@mtojek)
  • Hide "last seen" from users page when user is suspended (#16813, 77479cdd5) (@mtojek)
  • Select default org in template form if only one exists (#16639, 191b0efb8) (@Kira-Pilot)
  • Apply autofocus to workspace button search (#16905, 30179aeaa) (@mtojek)
  • Prevent audit log search from breaking with invalid query (#16944, f01ee963b) (@aslilac)
  • Add notifications back to desktop (#17021, bf59c7ca0) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Display force-tty flag (#17067, 081679f43) (@mtojek)
  • Implement device auth rate limit handling (#17079, d5557fcbf) (@hugodutka)
  • Improve error message when deleting organization with resources (#17049, cf10d98aa) (@brettkolodny)
  • Agent: Ensure RSA key generation always produces valid keys (#16694, 38c0e8a08) (@ThomasK33)
  • CLI: Replace $SESSION_TOKEN placeholder for external apps (#17048, 674f60fc5) (@johnstcn)
  • Database: Consider tag sets when calculating queue position (#16685, b85ba586e) (@evgeniy-scherbina)
  • Dashboard: Gracefully handle reselection of the same preset (#17014, 38b21ab35) (@SasSwart)

Documentation

  • Document new feature stages (#16719, 81ef9e9e8) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Add Coder Desktop early preview documentation (#16544, 73057eb7b) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Add OOM/OOD to notifications (#16582, 9251e0d64) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Document workspace presets (#16612, 0913594bf) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Convert alerts to use GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) (#16850, 101b62dc3) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Add cgroup memory troubleshooting to installation docs (#16920, a2131a761) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Document steps for adding cert to JetBrains plugin settings (#16882, 8ca52a835) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Add AWS AMI upgrade instructions (#16973, bd243c17f) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Add new doc on how to deploy Coder on Rancher (#16534, c88d86bf5) (@EdwardAngert)
  • Document definition of workspace activity (#16941, bbe7dacd3) (@EdwardAngert)

Chores

  • Add an unassign action for roles (#16728, 91a4a98c2) (@aslilac)
  • Update Terraform to v1.11.2 (#17081, 8da568b13) (@sreya)
  • Update go to 1.24.1 (#17194, 338439cd3) (@sreya)

Compare: v2.20.2...v2.21.0

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.21.0

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.19.3
entry.content:
Stable (since April 29, 2025)

Changelog

  • Extend request logs with auth & DB info and log long lived connections early (#17422, 0f27da0359) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Add path & method labels to prometheus metrics (#17416, bda202f3f1) (@ibetitsmike)

Compare: v2.19.1...v2.19.3

Container image

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.20.3
entry.content:
Stable (since April 29, 2025)

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • Add path & method labels to prometheus metrics for current requests (#17493, 550b81f1e) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Extend request logs with auth & DB info (#17498, fc8454b47) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Reduce excessive logging when database is unreachable (#17363, 7d0e909ca) (@dannykopping)
  • Prevent null loading sync settings (#17430, b56ffe01b) (@Emyrk)

    Fixes an issue causing front end to not load.

Chores

Compare: v2.20.2...v2.20.3

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.20.3

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.21.3
entry.content:
Stable (since May 6, 2025)

Changelog

[!NOTE] The next release (v2.22.0) has been postponed. The next mainline version will be available on May 15.

Bug fixes

  • Remove site wide perms from creating a workspace (#17296, 3fa1030b7) (@Emyrk)
  • Add path & method labels to prometheus metrics for current requests (#17362, 1d2af9ccc) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Log long-lived connections acceptance (#17219, 991d38c53) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Extend request logs with auth & DB info (#17497, f8d3fbf53) (@ibetitsmike)
  • Reduce excessive logging when database is unreachable (#17363, 9ea3910b2) (@dannykopping)
  • Log correct error on drpc connection close error (#17265, b1ccf4800) (@aaronlehmann)
  • Don't attempt to insert empty terraform plans into the database (cherry-pick #17426) (#17486, 9b3c7d7af) (@aslilac)
  • Don't show promote button for members (#17511, 1e8ac6c26) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Prevent null loading sync settings (#17430, b760f1d3a) (@Emyrk)

    Fixes an issue causing front end to not load under certain condition.

Compare: v2.21.0...v2.21.3

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.21.3

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.
